library.$description: Accessibility implementation uses React Aria hooks for headless accessibility. React Aria provides browser-consistent behavior, keyboard navigation, focus management, and ARIA attributes without dictating visual styling.

useMenu.$value: Menu container behavior and keyboard navigation
useMenu.$description: useMenu hook provides menu container behavior, keyboard navigation logic, and ARIA attributes for the <ul role="menu"> element.

useMenuItem.$description: useMenuItem hook provides individual menu item behavior, keyboard interactions, focus management, and ARIA attributes for each <li role="menuitem"> element.

useTreeState.$description: useTreeState hook manages menu item state and selection. Initialized with children: [] and selectionMode: 'none' as items are managed dynamically via useMenuItem hooks.

useFocusRing.$description: useFocusRing hook provides isFocusVisible state for styling focus rings. Distinguishes between keyboard focus (visible) and mouse focus (optional).

useHover.$description: useHover hook provides hover state management for menu items, enabling hover effects while maintaining accessibility.

useButton.$description: useButton hook provides accessible button behavior for the collapse/expand toggle button, including keyboard support and ARIA attributes.

dom-structure.$description: DOM structure: semantic <nav> with implicit role="navigation" landmark, <ul> with role="menu" (via useMenu), <li> elements with role="menuitem" (via useMenuItem), inner <button> elements with tabIndex={-1} to remove from tab order (navigation handled by menuItemProps).

file-location.$description: Location of the React component implementation file.

css-location.$description: Location of the CSS stylesheet for the component.

storybook-location.$description: Location of the Storybook stories for the component.
